content:
Hi All,
Currently, we are planning to handle ALL the possible search parameters for the resources. We found the list of the parameters of every resource with its description in the FHIR website, however we couldn't find an XML/JSON representation of these descriptions.
As an example, here is the description for the auditEvent resource:
http://hl7.org/fhir/auditevent.html
We would like to have an XML/JSON format of the search parameters section for ALL the resources, if such a material exists.
Thanks
Hi, if you download the JSON definitions zip from http://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html they include a file called search-parameters.json - is that what you're after? Cheers.

seems to be the one we are looking for.
Thanks a lot for your prompt answer.
